_header: That him were better to be dead
_description: Fragment of a tale involving a man and an ass — in couplets

PeterCath.Transcription: That hym were better to be dede…
PeterCath.Editions:
Dibdin,  Thomas Frognall. 
             A Bibliographical Antiquarian and Picturesque Tour in the Northern
                Counties of England and in Scotland.
